content:
TITLE: Phone Class Definitions in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Custom and pre-defined phone class specifications including consonants, glides, vowels, and other phonological elements. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_2 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` [bdf] [\g\v] \c \g \v \w \p \P ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Feature Specifications in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Various formats for specifying phonological features, including multi-line and single-line notations. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_1 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` {consonant,-vowel,glide} {c,g,v} {c, g, v} {c ,g ,v} {errFeature,consonant} ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Boundary and Group Operations in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Examples of boundary matchers, grouping constructs, and backreferences including relative and named groups. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_3 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` \b \S (\c)(\v) (\c)\S\1 (\w)(\c)\S\-1 (myGroup=\c\v) (?=\c\v) (?<\c\v) (?>\c\v) ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Basic Text and Regular Expression Patterns in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Examples of plain text matching and regular expression patterns in Phonex syntax. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` test is a test '.+' b'[oa]'k ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: SCType Plugin Patterns in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Patterns using the SCType plugin for syllable constituent typing and related operations. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_4 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` b:L:O:N:D:C:R:E b:l:o:n:d:c:r:e .:-n .:q b:sctype("Onset|LA") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Stress Pattern Specifications in Phonex DESCRIPTION: Various stress pattern specifications and stress plugin usage examples. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/test/resources/ca/phon/phonex/syntaxhighlighting_examples.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_5 LANGUAGE: phonex CODE: ``` .!1 .!2 .!A .!a .!U .!u .!d .:stress("1|U") ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Phonetic Analysis Keywords DESCRIPTION: List of keywords used for phonetic and diacritic analysis, including terms for diacritical marks and phonetic expressions. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/ipa/dict-en-eclipse.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` diacritics diacritic phonex ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Language Codes Data Structure in TSV Format DESCRIPTION: Tab-separated values file containing language code mappings with columns for ID, Part2B, Part2T, Part1, Scope, Language_Type, Ref_Name, and Comment. Each row represents a unique language entry with its associated metadata. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/util/src/main/resources/ISO-639-3_utf-8.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: TSV CODE: ``` Id Part2B Part2T Part1 Scope Language_Type Ref_Name Comment aaa I L Ghotuo aab I L Alumu-Tesu aac I L Ari ``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Defining Phon Workspace in HTML DESCRIPTION: A simple HTML document that defines a workspace folder in Phon as a folder containing one or more Phon sessions. The text is styled with a gray color. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/main/resources/ca/phon/app/welcome/workspace.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: html CODE: ```

A workspace folder is one that contains one or more Phon sessions.

``` ---------------------------------------- TITLE: Setting Default Report Template in Plain Text DESCRIPTION: This snippet specifies the default report template for the project. It points to a file named 'Generic Report.xml' located in the 'macro' directory. SOURCE: https://github.com/phon-ca/phon/blob/main/app/src/main/resources/analysis/QueryReportMap.txt#2025-04-21_snippet_0 LANGUAGE: plaintext CODE: ``` default=macro/Generic Report.xml ```
